H0.text: From Dec.29th 2011 which country will move forward a time zone, a move designed to help trade with China, Australia and New Zealand. Kiribati

H1.text: From Dec.29th 2011 which country will move forward a time zone, a move designed to help trade with China, Australia and New Zealand. Tonga

H2.text: From Dec.29th 2011 which country will move forward a time zone, a move designed to help trade with China, Australia and New Zealand. Fiji

H3.text: From Dec.29th 2011 which country will move forward a time zone, a move designed to help trade with China, Australia and New Zealand. Samoa

A4.text: Samoa changed its time zone offset from UTCâˆ’11 to UTC+13, effectively jumping forward by one day, omitting Friday, 30 December from the local calendar.

A5.text: This change aimed to help the nation boost its economy in doing business with Australia and New Zealand.
